definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
lit. people shouting and horses neighing (idiom)/fig. tumultuous/hubbub
old horse sniffs the wind (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations
old steed sniffs the wind (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations

sentences.english: He took a sip of tea making a slurping noise.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了口茶，發出嘶嘶的聲音。

sentences.english: He took a sip of tea making a slurping noise.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了口茶，發出嘶嘶的聲音。

sentences.english: White phosphorus fragments smoldered and hissed in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 白磷彈碎屑在積雪悶燃或嘶嘶燃燒。

sentences.english: White phosphorus fragments smoldered and hissed in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 白磷彈碎屑在積雪悶燃或嘶嘶燃燒。

sentences.english: Ms. Fizzle and her class learn about colors and light inside a pinball machine.
sentences.chinese: 嘶嘶女士和她的階級色彩和了解彈球機內輕。

sentences.english: Ms. Fizzle and her class learn about colors and light inside a pinball machine.
sentences.chinese: 嘶嘶女士和她的階級色彩和了解彈球機內輕。

sentences.english: "Just take a deep breath, Little Bat, "hissed Dragon.
sentences.chinese: “只需要一個深呼吸，小蝙蝠，”樹龍嘶嘶地說。

sentences.english: "Just take a deep breath, Little Bat, "hissed Dragon.
sentences.chinese: “只需要一個深呼吸，小蝙蝠，”樹龍嘶嘶地說。

sentences.english: The steam escaped with a hissing sound.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽漏出來時發出嘶嘶的聲音。

sentences.english: The steam escaped with a hissing sound.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽漏出來時發出嘶嘶的聲音。

sentences.english: The drink fizzes up when you first pour it.
sentences.chinese: 你初倒這種飲料時，它會嘶嘶冒泡。

sentences.english: The drink fizzes up when you first pour it.
sentences.chinese: 你初倒這種飲料時，它會嘶嘶冒泡。

sentences.english: The train hissed off the station.
sentences.chinese: 列車嘶嘶作響駛出了車站。

sentences.english: The train hissed off the station.
sentences.chinese: 列車嘶嘶作響駛出了車站。

sentences.english: The scratching sound of iron ladle on the basin bottom was as terrifying as the explosion of bombs.
sentences.chinese: 鐵勺刮盆底的嘶啦聲象炸彈的爆炸聲一樣令人驚心。
克魯利輕輕地發出了嘶嘶的聲音。

definition: to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
